unreleased:0e0a245660d2:
This release focuses on making changelog and release notes consistent and durable. It fixes an overwrite issue and refreshes recent entries for accuracy.

### Bug Fixes
- Prevented automated processes from overwriting release note formatting by ensuring the changelog and its summaries are saved together.

### Improvements
- Refreshed the release notes cache by adding the missing v0.8.1 entry and removing stale “unreleased” items.
- Rebuilt the changelog so v0.8.1 shows the structured summary instead of generic auto-generated text.
